intro.title: Kupu
intro.subtitle: We haven't created anything, we've just brought you together. Together, the limit of competitiveness is not defined by the sky.

advantatges.title: WHAT DO WE OFFER?
advantatges.text1: Create a professional tournament for FREE or compete in them to get the highest league and become one of the best Clash players.
advantatges.text2: Follow all the results of your favorite competitions, war after war.
